channel.title: Nate Bowie's Blog
channel.description: A quick homebrew feed for my blog. Does not include videos/articles I work on, just very occasional blog posts.

item.title: A New Site
item.description: Rambling on about some minor touch up work on my site, and some design changes to make it mobile friendly.

item.title: A New Site
item.description: After about a year hosting on IPFS I decided to revamp my site and transition where I host my site (though I'll still mirror on IPFS). I also updated my blog for the first time in over a year.

item.title: BitRot PSA: A YT Short
item.description: My second video, a YouTube short about the risks of BitRot.

item.title: I started a YouTube Channel
item.description: I created a YouTube channel and my first video.

item.title: Free Promo + Leaving KU
item.description: I ran a free promo to for my book, and ended exclusivity on Kindle Unlimited in favor of broader distrabution.

item.title: Well, I'm Live
item.description: Lauch date celebration of my book.

item.title: Official Release
item.description: An official time and date for my book's release, as well as preorders.

item.title: Announcing My Book
item.description: Announcing the title, description, and release date for the book I was working on.
